name: Bush Business
description:
You playing for Bush who have his own business. A bush business. Use The Selector and The Rad Emitter to create new bushes and sell them to earn money until winter comes!

Controls

Everything explained in game tutorial.

Credits

Code by Ludwintor

Art and Music by chagnarfaugn

Have a great day!

This game is developed for Discord Jam #5 in 48 hours. Theme: Mutation.
